de.mrapp.android.dialog.view

Class ViewPager

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.ViewGroup
      • android.support.v4.view.ViewPager
        • de.mrapp.android.dialog.view.ViewPager

  • public class ViewPager
extends android.support.v4.view.ViewPager
    A custom view pager, which allows to disable switching between fragments using swipe gestures.
    Since:
    3.2.0

        public ViewPager(@NonNull
                 Context context)
        Creates a new view pager, which allows to disable switching between fragments using swipe gestures.

      • ViewPager

        public ViewPager(@NonNull
                 Context context,
                 @Nullable
                 AttributeSet attributeSet)
        Creates a new view pager, which allows to disable switching between fragments using swipe gestures.
        Parameters:
        context - The context, which should be used by the view, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        attributeSet - The attribute set, the view's attributes should be obtained from, as an instance of the type AttributeSet or null, if no attributes should be obtained

    • Method Detail

      • isSwipeEnabled

        public final boolean isSwipeEnabled()
        Returns, whether switching between fragments using swipe gestures is enabled, or not.
        Returns:
        True, if switching between fragments using swipe gestures is enabled, false otherwise

      • enableSwipe
